citing_paper_authors: Els, Lefever | Lieve, Macken | Véronique, Hoste
raw_text: On the one hand, the linguistically-based or rule-based approaches use linguistic information such as PoS tags, chunk information, etc. to filter out stop words and restrict candidate terms to predefined syntactic patterns (Ananiadou, 1994), (Dagan and Church, 1994)
clean_text: On the one hand, the linguistically-based or rule-based approaches use linguistic information such as PoS tags, chunk information, etc. to filter out stop words and restrict candidate terms to predefined syntactic patterns (Ananiadou, 1994), (Dagan and Church, 1994).

citing_paper_authors: Philippe, Langlais | Michel, Simard | Jean, Veronis
raw_text: Such a tool has proved extremely useful not only for translators, but also for bilingual lexicographers (Langlois, 1996) and terminologists (Dagan and Church, 1994)
clean_text: Such a tool has proved extremely useful not only for translators, but also for bilingual lexicographers (Langlois, 1996) and terminologists (Dagan and Church, 1994).

raw_text: Our system is most similar to Termight (Dagan and Church, 1994) and TransSearch (Macklovitch et al, 2000)
clean_text: Our system is most similar to Termight (Dagan and Church, 1994) and TransSearch (Macklovitch et al, 2000).
